item.title: Discrete and Continuous Probability distribution
item.description: We continue our discussion of the Discrete and Continuous Probability distribution. Blood Types - Discrete distribution function Here we present the distribution of different Blood Types # x p 1 O 45% 2 A 40% 3 B 11% 4 AB 4% Emergency Room probability distribution function The number of patients seen in an Emergency Room in any given hour is provided by a random variable x
